mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t7.id, t7.per_name AS perName, t7.per_code AS perCode, t7.per_group AS perGroup, t7.per_url AS perUrl, t7.remark, t7.isvalid, t7.ctime, t7.creater, t7.mtime, t7.updater FROM auth_user t1 INNER JOIN auth_user_role t2 ON t2.isvalid = 1 AND t2.user_id = t1.id INNER JOIN auth_role t3 ON t3.isvalid = 1 AND t3.id = t2.role_id INNER JOIN auth_role_menu t4 ON t4.isvalid = 1 AND t4.role_id = t3.id INNER JOIN auth_menu t5 ON t5.isvalid = 1 AND t5.id = t4.menu_id INNER JOIN auth_menu_permission t6 ON t6.isvalid = 1 AND t6.menu_id = t5.id INNER JOIN auth_permission t7 ON t7.isvalid = 1 AND t7.id = t6.per_id WHERE t1.isvalid = 1 AND t1.id = #{userId}
